data.title: Richard Harward - Men's Basketball 2021-2022
data.meta_description: Men's Basketball 2021-2022 - Richard Harward: The official athletics website for the BYU Cougars.
data.text:
BYU Highlights

Appeared in 28 games during BYU career

Averaged 5.1 points, 4.0 rebounds and 0.5 blocks per game

Scored in double figures eight times including a pari of double-doubles

Personal

Parents are Bradley and Alice Harward

Has four sisters and one brother

His brother Ian played basketball at BYU and BYU-Hawaii

Served a mission for The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints in Australia

Instagram: @richardharward_42 | LinkedIn: Richard Harward

Before BYU

Played his freshman and sophomore seasons at Utah Valley

Named to the 2018-19 NABC Honors Court

Named the Jan. 14, 2019, WAC Player of the Week

As a sophomore in 2018-19 averaged 10.8 points, 7.1 rebounds and shot 67.9 percent from the field in 20.5 minutes of action during the last 18 games of the season

For the season, averaged 6.9 points, 4.9 rebounds and shot 63.8 percent from the field while posting three double-doubles and season highs of 19 points, 16 rebounds and five blocks

As a freshman, appeared in 14 games and averaged 1.3 points per game and 1.9 rebounds per game

Prepped at Orem High School where as a senior in 2014-15, earned first-team all-state honors while leading the Tigers to a 20-6 record and run to the semifinals of the 2015 4A Utah State Championships

Averaged 13.6 points, 8.9 rebounds, 2.0 assists and 2.6 blocks as a senior
